tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This was a follow up with my dentist and am really happy to have discovered them .
Have been going here for past 5 years have visited four different dentist before finally ending up here .

Always feel like it's my first time visit with a world class service and a value for pay.

Thank you very much.

I thought that laminates were a very costly process and was worried about the appearance of my front teeth. But this dentist explained to me the process in details and agreed to a discount on the cost involved as well.Now my teeth look very much better with no fluoride effect on the teeth and no yellow or brownish stains. Thank the dentist a lot and would recommend this dentist to my relatives and friends.
good.. promt in attending to the patients problem.. listens & understands before starting the treatment.. stiff & proper in handling..

Costly, only show, for dental cleaning other dentist are charging 400 to 500 but clinic charging 900 and in mid of cleaning increasing to 1700 rs saying your teeth cleaning takes more time, why it was not told before stating.
Had bleeding gums so underwent scaling and polishing of teeth.Response was good.had a painless experience throughout
Tooth were irregular  underwent composite treatment and the team of dentists  were very kind and helpful to me. Thanks a lot to them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Had discolouerd front teeth due to flourosis but my smille looked browmish and nit pleasing was svated to smile loudly and laugh in office in front of others later on i went for composite light cure treatment called bonding for front teeth upper and lower very happy and satisfued great dedicatuon to treatment very happy to get my smile back and i can now laugh openly without any guilt would highly recommend this dentist to everyone who wants quality care

The clinic looked very neat and posh .It had all the latest equipments including rotary instruments for doing a fast and accurate and painless root canal treatment that was completed in a single sitting. Later on I had a ceramic crown.would definitely recommend this clinic.

Teeth seed stained and brownish colour due to fluoride effect. Then I was explained about fluoride  and composite light cure treatment using ultraviolet light. I decided to go for it. The teeth and facial appearance and my smile changed almost immediately now I feel more confident when I go for my work as includes a marketing job and talking to customers. I would recommend this dentist to my relations and friends.

I was in severe pain the doctors advised me an x ray and root canal treatment. I underwent rct which was totally painless and later on a zirconia crown was placed on it,all this at a very short span of time. I am happy and would recommend this dentist to my family

Had irregular and protruding front teeth but after the treatment that I undertook am very happy with my looks and improved smile.can't help smiling more often now would recommend this dentist to my family and friend s

review:
They just took money for consultation .. we just asked how much it would cost to place the surgical tooth.. they said 750.. 


They also took consultation fee without treating.********* ********
reply_text: It is unfortunate that you thought that we would do consultation check up the patient and suggest you the treatment plan for free inspite of you coming  one hour late  than your scheduled appointment time.

review: *** ** **** **** **** ** ****** ** *** **** ****** *** ****** *** **** *** **** ******** ** *****  consultation fee is low butshe takes the X-ray , but she won't give any copy  filling charges are very high

review: Had protruding teeth so underwent smile design treatment now my teeth look very beautiful smile and improved my self confidence when I smile highly recommend this clinic to any one who wants good value treatment in India of international standards

review: Underwent deep scaling and polishing of teeth was on a short visit from abroad happy to find a good and caring dentist with very gentle and painless treatment highly recommended for everyone clinic has latest equipment like digital x Ray etc

review: Underwent zirconia crowns zenistar with 15years warranty great looks and excellent value for the treatment travelling from USA highly recommended for the best patient care and great pricing
I was very impressed by the clinic.The ambience was very good. I did not have to wait any time as the doctors attended to me very promptly. I would recommend this clinic to my friends and relatives.
